name: Industrial RO System
desc: Reverse osmosis (RO) is a water purification technology that uses a semipermeable membrane to remove ions, molecules, and larger particles from drinking water. STARLIN Reverse Osmosis System provides an economical way to obtain pure water from brackish water. These are highly reliable, field proven and cost effective. Designed with flexibility, the series utilize state-of-art spiral wound reverse osmosis membranes. These systems can remove 90 â€“ 98 % of the total dissolved solids.
specification: Spiral wound membrane elements of polyamide type

name: Demineralisers Systems
desc: The process of removing mineral salts from water by using the ion exchange process, is known as Demineralization. Twin Bed Portable Demineralizers. Portable Polisher Demineralizers.Removes dissolved salts and minerals. Two-bed and mixed-bed designs with fully automatic operation and low maintenance cost.

name: Industrial Demineralisers
desc: Industrial Demineralizer (DI) Systems are designed and manufactured for industrial applications that use to lower the minerals amount % soften the water. Industrial Twin Bed Portable Demineralizers SBU Series Industrial Polisher Bed Demineralizers

name: Softeners Systems
desc: Water Softening System, is the removal of calcium, magnesium, and certain other metal cations in hard water. Packaged Softeners U-Series Softeners Industrial Softeners Industrial Downflow Softeners

name: Filtration System & Accessories
desc: MultiGrade Filter : The Starlin industrial Multigrade Filters is a depth filter that makes use of coarse and fine media mix,together in fixed proportion. This arrangement produces a filter bed with adequate pore dimensions for retaining both large and small suspended particles.This filter performs at a substantially higher specific flow rate than conventional filters. Specific flow rates of 15-30m/h have been successfully obtained for treating waters containing 50-25ppm suspended solids respectively to produce a filtrate with less
features: Higher specific flow rate than conventional downflow filters thereby saving on space and cost.
In most cases, raw water can be used for backwash.
spcification: One set of internal water distribution and collection system.
One initial charge of filter sand and under bed material.
One set of frontal pipe work and valves.
Two pressure gauges to monitor head loss across the filter.
Maximum/minimum operating pressure will be 3.5kg./cm and 2.0kg./cm respectively.

name: RO-EDI Systems
desc: Our fully integrated and fully automated RO-EDI System is a highly optimized system for efficient water and power management. The compact skid mounted system is comes connection ready and with complete validation package. The system is designed to deliver compendial water Purified Water as per all major pharmacopeias
features: Ready to commission, Plug and Play system
PLC with intuitive touch screen HMI
Hot water subitizable RO & EDI modules

name: Storage & Distribution Loop Line System
desc: Our Purified Water Distribution, Dis-infection and monitoring systems are designed to be Plug & Play. They are compact skid mounted, pre-assembled, tested and prewired in the factory. The system can be in-situ sanitized (CIP) with hot water or Ozone or can be steam sterilized in place (SIP).Jacketed, Insulated, Electropolished, Storage Tank (SS316L) 365 deg. Spray Ball with Jacketed Vent filter
features: Compact Distribution, Disinfection and Monitoring skid
TOC Analyser, Flow, Pressure, Temperature Transmitter
Control Panel with PLC and touch screen HMI
Designed with Power Saving features including (VFD)

name: Ultrafiltration System
desc: Ultrafiltration systems are key to enable optimal performance of UF System. Our Fully automated, hot water subitizable Ultrafiltration (UF) System ensures SDI < 3 and at least 6 log reduction of bacteria, 5 log reduction of viruses and 4 log viral load reduction. The fully automated system ensures timely backwash based on timer or differential pressure. This esures the system runs healthy at all times. The CIP is also fully automated. The system is designed as a compact and skid mounted model. The SS/CI pumps ensure high reliability, easy serviceability and trouble free operation for a long time.Fully automated operation, backwash and sanitization cycles
features: PES membranes with 6 KD / 10 KD NMW cutoff
Hot water subitizable up to 98 deg. C
High pH tolerance (1-12) for effective backwash / cleaning

name: Hydro-Pneumatic System
desc: Hydro pneumatics tank contains pressurized air and water. It does not have a bladder and air is in direct contact with the water. The compressed air acts as a cushion exerting or absorbing pressure.The system is most ideal for High Rise Apartments and Buildings where the demand of water is variable and fitted with modern bathroom fittings like Jacuzzis, shower etc. which require pressurized water for better functioning of the fittings

name: ETP – Effluent Treatment Plant
desc: We are manufacturing the ETP Plant as per client Requirement and Applications as per specification of industry. We offer The ETP System with conventional Treatment like MBR, MBBR, SAFF, UF, NF, DAF, SBR, Multi Evaporator with Prefabricated Unit. Used the Plant are ZLD and Reused

name: STP – Sewage Treatment Plant
desc: Sewage water Treatment is the process of removing contaminants form waste water and household sewage . Both runoff(Effluent) and domestic. The sewage from the residential and commercial building is the treated for reduction in BOD, COD & TSS in order to comply  with the pollution control board standards. Sewage water treatment plant several Processes like Chemical, Biological and Physical processes of water Treatment. These methods of water treatment plants are successfully remove mud, effluent and poisonous material from the sewage water

name: WTP – Water Treatment Plant
desc: We manufacture Water Treatment Plants (WTP) for purification and filtration of raw water from different sources like borewell, river, or municipal supply. Our WTP units are designed to remove impurities, hardness, turbidity, and bacteria, ensuring safe and potable water supply for industrial, commercial, and residential use.
features: Suitable for industrial and domestic applications

name: ZLD – Zero Liquid Discharge Plant
desc: Our Zero Liquid Discharge (ZLD) Plants are engineered to recover, recycle, and reuse wastewater by eliminating liquid discharge completely. Using advanced evaporators, crystallizers, and RO systems, ZLD plants are widely adopted in textile, pharma, and chemical industries to meet stringent environmental compliance and achieve sustainability.
